param.name: cid
param.label: Client ID (ex. 1234)
param.description: Enter your Swarm Interactive client ID

param.name: secure
param.label: Use secure HTTPS
param.description: If 'No' (default), ViewMedica player will be delivered through regular HTTP. If 'Yes', the ViewMedica will be delivered through HTTPS.

param.name: lang
param.label: Default language
param.description: Choose the language that you would like ViewMedica to load by default

param.name: fullscreen
param.label: Allow fullscreen mode
param.description: If 'Yes' (default), the 'Enlarge' button will be displayed so users can maximize the ViewMedica player to full-screen. If 'No', the 'Enlarge' button won't be displayed (usually only done when the displaying web page has problems with Flash full-screen mode).

param.name: enableaudio
param.label: Enable audio
param.description: If 'Yes' (default), audio will be enabled on all animations. If 'No', audio will be disabled.

param.name: brochure
param.label: Enable brochures
param.description: If 'Yes' (default), users will be allowed to print brochures from within the ViewMedica animations. If 'No', the Brochure button will be turned off.

param.name: disclaimer
param.label: Enable disclaimer button
param.description: If 'Yes' (default), users will be able to click the Disclaimer button to read the disclaimer text. If 'No', The Disclaimer button will be turned off.
